question: Alright everyone, this is a stick- up! Don't anybody move! Now empty that safe! Ooh! Money. Money. Money. Stop it! Stop it, you mean old potato! Quiet Bo Peep, or your sheep get run over! Heeeeelp! BAAAAA! Heeeelp us! Oh, no! Not my sheep! Somebody do something!
answer: Reach for the sky.

question: Oh, no! Sheriff Woody!! I'm here to stop you, One-Eyed Bart. Doooooh! How'd you know it was me! Are you gonna come quietly? You can't touch me Sheriff! I brought my attack dog with a built- in force field! Well I brought my DINOSAUR, who eats force field dogs!! AAAAR! ROAR-ROAR-ROAR! YIPE! YIPE-YIPE-YIPE! You're goin' to jail, Bart. Say good-bye to the wife and tatertots. You saved the day again, Woody.
answer: You're my favorite deputy.

question: C'mon, let's wrangle up the cattle. Score! Wow! Cool!
answer: Whadda ya think?

question: Oh, this looks GREAT, Mom! Can we leave this up 'til we move?
answer: Well, sure, we can leave it up.

question: Yeah!
answer: Now go get Molly. Your friends are going to be here any minute.

question: Okay, thank you. At ease. Hey, Slinky?
answer: Right here, Woody! I'm red this time.

question: No, Slink --
answer: Oh...well alright, you can be red if you want.

question: Not now, Slink. I've got some bad news.
answer: Bad news?!

question: Sh-h-h-h-h!! Just gather everyone up for a staff meeting and be happy!!
answer: Got it.

question: Be HAPPY! Staff meeting, everybody. Snake, Robot -- podium duty. Hey Etch! Draw! Oh!! You got me again, Etch! You've been working on that draw. Fastest knobs in the west.
answer: Got a staff meeting, you guys, come on, let's go!

question: Now where is that -- ? Aw, hey, who moved my doodle pad way over here?
answer: ROOAAAARR!!!

question: Oh, how ya doin', Rex?
answer: Were you scared? Tell me honestly.

question: I was close to being scared that time.
answer: I'm going for fearsome here, but I just don't feel it. I think I'm just coming off as annoying.

question: Aach! -- Oh, hi, Bo.
answer: I wanted to thank you, Woody, for saving my flock.

question: Oh, hey - it was nothing.
answer: Whadda ya say I get someone else to watch the sheep tonight?

question: Heh, heh...oh yeah, uh, I...
answer: Remember, I'm just a couple of blocks away.

question: Hey! What did I tell you earlier? No one is getting replaced. Now let's all be polite, and give whatever it is up there a nice, big "Andy's Room" welcome.
answer: Buzz Lightyear to Star Command. Come in, Star Command. Star Command - come in. Do you read me? Why don't they answer?!! Just then, Buzz catches sight of his ripped packaging. The box is designed to look like a spaceship. Blast! This'll take weeks to repair! Buzz Lightyear Mission Log. Stardate 4072 Terrain seems a bit unstable... No read-out yet if the air is breathable... and there seems to be no sign of intelligent life anywhere --

question: Hello-o-o...
answer: HO-YAAAHH!!!

question: Aaaaaaah! Whoa, hey, whoa, did I frighten you? Didn't mean to. Sorry. Howdy! My name is Woody and this is Andy's room. That's all I wanted to say, and also, there has been a bit of a mix-up. This is my spot, see, the bed here --
answer: Local law enforcement! It's about time you got here. I'm Buzz Lightyear, Space Ranger, Universe Protection Unit. My ship has crash landed here by mistake.

question: Yes, it is a mistake, because, you see, the bed, here, is my spot.
answer: I need to repair my turbo boosters. Do you people still use fossil fuels, or have you discovered crystalic fusion?

question: Well, let's see, we've got double A's --
answer: Watch yourself!! Halt! Who goes there?!

question: Alright, everyone. You're clear to come up. I am Buzz Lightyear. I come in peace.
answer: Oh, I'm so glad you're not a dinosaur!

question: Why, thank you... Now thank you all for your kind welcome.
answer: Say! What's that button do?

question: All right, that's enough. Look, we're all very impressed with Andy's new toy --
answer: Toy?

question: T-O-Y. Toy.
answer: Excuse me, I think the word you're searching for is Space Ranger.

question: Oh, what?!...What?! These are plastic. He can't fly!
answer: They are a terillium-carbonic alloy and I CAN fly.

question: No, you can't.
answer: Yes, I can.

question: You can't!
answer: Can!

question: Can't! Can't! Can't!
answer: I tell you, I could fly around this room with my eyes closed!

question: Okay then, Mr. Lightbeer! Prove it.
answer: All right, then, I will. Stand back everyone! To infinity and beyond!! Can.

question: Alright! That's it!
answer: Unidirectional bonding strip.

question: Listen, Lightsnack, you stay away from Andy. He's mine, and no one is taking him away from me.
answer: What are you talking about? Where's that bonding strip?!

question: And another thing. Stop with this spaceman thing. It's getting on my nerves.
answer: Are you saying you want to lodge a complaint with Star Command?

question: Oh okay, so you want to do it the hard way, huh?
answer: Don't even think about it, cowboy!

question: Oh, yeah, tough guy?!
answer: The air isn't toxic. How dare you open a spaceman's helmet on an uncharted planet! My eyeballs could've been sucked from their sockets!

question: You actually think you're THE "Buzz Lightyear?" Oh, all this time I thought it was an act! Hey, guys! Look! It's the REAL Buzz Lightyear!
answer: You're mocking me, aren't you?

question: Oh, no, no, no... Buzz, look! An alien!
answer: Where?

question: What's going on?
answer: Nothing that concerns you spacemen. Just us TOYS.

question: I'd better take a look anyway. Why is that soldier strapped to an explosive device?
answer: That's why. Sid.

question: Sure is a hairy fellah.
answer: No! No, that's Scud, you idiot! THAT is Sid!

question: To infinity and beyond!
answer: Oh, all this packing makes me hungry. What would you say to dinner at, uh, oh, Pizza Planet?

question: Pizza Planet?! Oh, cool!
answer: Go wash your hands and I'll get Molly ready.

question: Can I bring some toys?
answer: You can bring ONE toy...

question: One toy? Will Andy pick me? Don't count on it?!! Doh-h-h-h! Buzz!! Oh, Buzz, Buzz Lightyear!! Buzz Lightyear, thank goodness! We've got trouble!
answer: Trouble?! Where?!

question: Down there. Just down there. A helpless toy...it's...it's trapped, Buzz!
answer: Then we've no time to lose!! I don't see anything!

question: Oh, he's there. Just, just keep looking.
answer: What kind of a toy -- ?

question: Andy! I'm heading out the door.
answer: But Mom, I can't find him!

question: Well, honey, just grab some other toy! Now c'mon!
answer: Okay... I couldn't find my Buzz. I know I left him right there.

question: Can I help pump the gas?
answer: Sure! I'll even let you drive.

question: Yeah?!
answer: Yeah -- when you're sixteen.

question: Oh, great. How am I gonna convince those guys it was an accident? Buzz! Buzz! You're alive! This is great! Oh, I'm saved! I'm saved! Andy'll find you here, he'll take us back to the room, and then you can tell everyone that this was all just a big mistake. Huh? Right? Buddy?
answer: I just want you to know that even though you tried to terminate me, revenge is not an idea we promote on my planet.

question: Oh. Oh, that's good.
answer: But we're not on my planet, are we?

question: Doesn't he realize that I'm not there? I'm LOST! Oh, I'm a lost toy!
answer: Buzz Lightyear Mission Log. The local Sheriff and I seem to be at a huge refueling station of some sort --

question: You!
answer: According to my nava-computer, the --

question: Shut up! Just shut up, you idiot!!
answer: Sheriff, this is no time to panic.

question: This is the perfect time to panic! I'm lost, Andy is gone, they're going to move from their house in two days and it's all your fault!!
answer: My fault?! If you hadn't pushed me out of the window in the first place --

question: Oh, yeah? Well, if YOU hadn't shown up in your stupid little cardboard spaceship and taken away everything that was important to me --
answer: Don't talk to me about importance. Because of YOU the security of this entire universe is in jeopardy.

question: WHAT?!! What are you talking about?!
answer: Right now, poised at the edge of the galaxy, Emperor Zurg has been secretly building a weapon with the destructive capacity to annihilate an entire planet. I alone have information that reveals this weapon's only weakness. And you, my friend, are responsible for delaying my rendez-vous with Star Command.

question: YOU ARE A TOY!!! You aren't the real Buzz Lightyear, you're an action figure!! You are a child's plaything!!!
answer: You are a sad strange little man and you have my pity. Farewell.

question: Now you're sure this spacefreighter will return to its port of origin once it jettisons its food supply?
answer: Uh-huh. And when we get there, we'll be able to find a way to transport you...home.

question: Well, then let's climb abroad.
answer: No, no, no, wait, Buzz, Buzz, let's get in the back. No one will see us there.

question: Negative. There are no restraining harnesses in the cargo area. We'll be much safer in the cockpit.
answer: Yeah, but, Buzz! Buzz!

question: Now we need to find a ship that's headed for Sector 12 --
answer: Wait a minute! No Buzz! This way! There's a special ship. I just saw it!

question: You mean it has hyperdrive?
answer: Hyper-active hyperdrive, and astro...uh, turf. C'mon, c'mon, that's it...

question: Where is it? I don't see the -- Spaceship.
answer: Alright Buzz, get ready... Okay, Buzz, when I say "go," we're gonna jump in the basket -- Buzz! Dooh! No! This cannot be happening to me!!

question: Greetings! I am Buzz Lightyear! I come in peace! This is an intergalactic emergency! I need to commandeer your vessel to Sector 12! Who's in charge here?
answer: This is ludicrous. Oh, no! Sid!!! Get down!!

question: What's gotten into you, Sheriff? I was --
answer: YOU are the one that decided to climb into this --

question: Ready, set, NOW. Hannah! Hey, Hannah!!!
answer: What?

question: Did I get my package in the mail?
answer: I dunno.

question: Whaddaya mean, you don't know?
answer: I don't know!

question: Oh no, Hannah!
answer: What?

question: Look! Janie!
answer: Hey!!

question: She's sick!
answer: No she's NOT --

question: I'll have to perform one of my...operations!
answer: NO-O-O... Don't touch her! NO!

question: Mom, have you seen Woody?
answer: Where was the last place you left him?

question: Right here in the van.
answer: Oh, I'm sure he's there. You're just not looking hard enough.

question: Are you alright? I'm proud of you, Sheriff. A lesser man would have talked under such torture.
answer: I sure hope this isn't permanent.

question: Still no word from Star Command. We're not that far from the spaceport --
answer: The door! It's open! We're free!!

question: Woody, we don't know what's out there!
answer: I'll tell you what's -- AAAAH! They're gonna eat us, Buzz!! Do something! Quick!

question: Shield your eyes! It's not working. I recharged it before I left. It should be good for hours --
answer: Oh, you idiot! You're a toy! Use your karate chop action! Get away! Hoo-cha! Hoo-cha!

question: Hey!! Hey! How are you doing that? Stop that!
answer: Back! Back, you savages! Back!

question: Woody, stop it!!
answer: Sorry guys, but dinner's canceled! There's no place like home. There's no place like home. There's no place like home...

question: Another stunt like that, cowboy -- you're going to get us killed.
answer: Don't tell me what to do!

question: Shhh!
answer: YEEEEEEE-HAAAAAAA!! Giddy-up partner!... ...We got to get this wagon train a movin'!

question: Would you like some tea, Mrs. Nesbit?
answer: Buzz!

question: It's so nice you could join us on such late notice.
answer: Oh, no!

question: What a lovely hat, Mrs. Nesbit. It goes quite well with your head.
answer: Hannah! Oh, Hannah!

question: Mom? Please excuse me, ladies. I'll be right back. What is it, Mom? Mom, where are you?
answer: Buzz! Hey, Buzz! Are you okay?

question: Buzz! Hey, Buzz! Are you okay?
answer: Gone! It's all go-o-one! All of it's gone. Bye-bye! Whoo-hoo! See ya!

question: What happened to you?
answer: One minute you're defending the whole galaxy... ...and suddenly you find yourself suckin' down Darjeeling with Marie Antoinette and her little sisters.

question: I think you've had enough tea for today. Let's get you out of here, Buzz.
answer: Don't you get it?! You see the hat? I am Mrs. Nesbit!!

question: Snap out of it, Buzz!
answer: I'm sorry. You're right. ...I'm just a little depressed, that's all. I can get through this. Oh, I'm a sham!!

question: Sh-h-h-h-h!! Quiet, Buzz.
answer: Look at me! I can't even fly out of a window! But -- the hat looked good. Tell me the hat looked good! The apron is a bit much, it's not my color...

question: Out the window...Buzz, you're a genius! Come on, this way!
answer: Years of Academy training...wasted!!

question: Miss. G-6.
answer: Ohhh! You sunk it!

question: Heh-heh.
answer: Are you peeking?

question: Oh, quit your whining and pay up. No, no, not the ear. Gimme the nose. C'mon!
answer: How 'bout three out of five?

question: Murderer!
answer: No! No, no, no, no!

question: You murdering dog!
answer: No, it's not what you think, I swear!

question: Save it for the jury. I hope Sid pulls your voice-box out, ya creep!
answer: No! No! Don't leave! Don't leave! You've gotta help us, please! You don't know what it's like over here!

question: Aaaah! I need air! Aa-a-a-a-ah!
answer: Will you quit moving around?!

question: I'm sorry. It's just that I get so nervous before I travel.
answer: How did I get stuck with YOU as a moving buddy?

question: Ps-s-s-s-t! Psst! Hey, Buzz! Hey! Get over here and see if you can get this tool box off me. Oh, come on, Buzz. I...Buzz, I can't do this without you. I need your help.
answer: I can't help. I can't help anyone.

question: Why, sure you can, Buzz. You can get me out of here and then I'll get that rocket off you, and we'll make a break for Andy's house.
answer: Andy's house. Sid's house. What's the difference.

question: Oh, Buzz, you've had a big fall. You must not be thinking clearly.
answer: No, Woody, for the first time I am thinking clearly. You were right all along. I'm not a Space Ranger. I'm just a toy. A stupid little insignificant toy.

question: Whoa, hey -- wait a minute. Being a toy is a lot better than being a Space Ranger.
answer: Yeah, right.

question: No, it is. Look, over in that house is a kid who thinks you are the greatest, and it's not because you're a Space Ranger, pal, it's because you're a TOY! You are HIS toy.
answer: But why would Andy want me?

question: Why would Andy want you?! Look at you! You're a Buzz Lightyear. Any other toy would give up his moving parts just to be you. You've got wings, you glow in the dark, you talk, your helmet does that -- that whoosh thing -- you are a COOL toy. As a matter of fact you're too cool. I mean -- I mean what chance does a toy like me have against a Buzz Lightyear action figure? All I can do is... There's a snake in my boots! Why would Andy ever want to play with me, when he's got you? I'm the one that should be strapped to that rocket. Listen Buzz, forget about me. You should get out of here while you can.
answer: He is on top of the milkcrate, trying to push the tool box off.

question: Buzz!! What are you doing? I thought you were --
answer: Come on, Sheriff. There's a kid over in that house who needs us. Now let's get you out of this thing.

question: Yes Sir! Come on, Buzz! We can do it!
answer: Woody! It's the moving van.

question: We've got to get out of here...NOW. C'mon, Buzz. Alright. Buzz! Hey! I'm out!
answer: ...almost

question: All right, listen up. I need Pump Boy here -- Ducky here. Legs? You're with Ducky. RollerBob and I don't move till we get the signal. Clear? Okay, let's move!
answer: HAND-IN-THE-BOX, the rubber hand in the Jack-in-the-box, stacks on top of several mutant toys to reach the doorknob of the bedroom door.

question: Wind the frog!
answer: All the toys have manned their positions and wait silently, their eyes fixed on Woody.

question: Wait for the signal.
answer: Woody throws his arm down.

question: Go!!
answer: I'll get it!

question: Alright, let's go.
answer: I'm coming! I'm coming! SCUD!!! Stupid dog.

question: Woody?! Great! Help me out of this thing!
answer: Shhhhhhh!

question: What?!
answer: It's ok. Everything's under control.

question: Houston, all systems are go. Requesting permission to launch -- Hey! How'd you get out here? Oh, well, you and I can have a cookout later. Ha-ha-ha... Houston, do we have permission to launch? -- Uh, Roger, permission granted. You are confirmed at T minus 10 seconds... ...and counting. Ten! Nine! Eight! Seven! Six! Five! Four! Three! Two!... One!...
answer: Reach for the sky!!

question: Huh?
answer: This town ain't big enough for the two of us!

question: What?!
answer: Somebody's poisoned the water hole...

question: It's busted.
answer: Who are you callin' busted, Buster?! That's right. I'm talking to YOU, Sid Phillips. We don't like being blown up, Sid, or smashed, or ripped apart...

question: W-w-w-we?
answer: That's right. Your toys. From now on, you must take good care of your toys. Because if you don't, we'll find out, Sid. We toys can see... ...everything. So play nice.

question: Woody! The van!
answer: We gotta run! Thanks, guys. Quick!

question: Just go! I'll catch up! Come on! You can do it, Woody.
answer: Whew, I made it! Aaaaaahh!! Get away, you stupid dog! Down! Down!

question: Hold on, Woody!
answer: I can't do it! Take care of Andy for me!

question: NO-O-O-O-O-O-O!!
answer: Buzz!

question: Slink! Hang on! Great!
answer: Woody! The rocket!

question: The match! Yes! Thank you, Sid! No-o-o! No-no-no-no! No-o-o!
answer: Woody?! What are you doing?

question: Hold still, Buzz! Ha-ha!!
answer: You did it! Next stop. Andy.

question: Ahhh!! This is the part where we blow up!
answer: Not today!

question: Ah-h-h-h-h!! Hey, Buzz!! You're flying!!
answer: This isn't flying. This is falling -- with style!

question: Ha ha!! To Infinity and Beyond!! Uh, Buzz?! We missed the truck!
answer: We're not aiming for the truck!

question: Hey! Wow!
answer: What? What is it?

question: Woody! Buzz!
answer: Oh, great, you found them. Where were they?

question: Here! In the car!
answer: See? Now, what did I tell you? Right where you left them.

question: Which one can I open first?
answer: Let's let Molly open one.
